All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddMode
Enumeration of modes for commands that make changes to a collection element.
BufferedDataBase
Stores a database that can be manipulated in real time using a commands.
Checker
Allows implementations to validate the fields of a Vehicle class.
CheckingResult
Acts as a returned value for classes that implement the Checker interface.
ClearCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'clear' command.
Command
Interface for all commands.
CommandInvoker
Calls each wrapper command.
CommandParser
Processes the lines entered by the user.
CommandParser.UserLineSeparator
Separates a command from its arguments.
Console
Designed for input-output information.
Coordinates
Contains two coordinate variables for Vehicle class.
Correction
Classes that implement this interface do value correction before checking.
CountByFuelTypeCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'count by fuel' type command.
ExecuteMode
These modes are used for the correct output of information.
ExecuteScriptCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'execute script' command.
ExitCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'exit' command.
FileHandler
Operates on all project files.
FileType
Used to determine the path to a specific file.
FilterLessThanFuelTypeCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'filter less than fuel type' command.
FuelType
Enumeration of types of vehicle fuel.
HelpCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'help' command.
IdentifierHandler
Performs identifiers validation or generation.
InfoCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'info' command.
InsertCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'insert' command.
JsonReader
Converts database from json to hashtable collection.
JsonWriter
Converts collection from hashtable to json.
Main
The entry point to the program, declares and initializes all the necessary classes.
NoSuchIdException
 
Process
Classes that implement this interface contain messages for output in insert mode, correction and check classes.
RemoveAllByEnginePowerCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'remove all by engine power' command.
RemoveGreaterCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'remove greater' command.
RemoveGreaterKeyCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'remove greater key' command.
RemoveKeyCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'remove key' command.
RemoveLowerCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'remove lower' command.
RemoveMode
Used to distinguish between two commands to remove an element.
SaveCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'save' command.
ShowCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'show' command.
UpdateCommand
Acts as a wrapper for the 'update' command.
ValueHandler
Contains correction and checking of all values of the collection class.
ValueTransformer
Contains functions for converting each string value to Vehicle class values.
ValueType
Used to determine the type of value in checkers.
Vehicle
Used as a separate element in the database.
VehicleType
Enumeration of vehicle types.
WrongAmountOfArgumentsException
Thrown when the number of arguments does not match the provided.
